mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply ( re_code, re_content, created_at, re_secret, re_depth, b_code, m_code ) VALUES ( reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{re_content}, SYSDATE, #{re_secret}, #{re_depth}, #{b_code}, #{m_code} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.RE_CODE, r.RE_CONTENT, r.CREATED_AT, r.RE_SECRET, r.RE_DEPTH, r.B_CODE, r.M_CODE, m.M_NICK AS m_nick FROM REPLY r JOIN MEMBER m ON r.M_CODE = m.M_CODE WHERE r.B_CODE = #{b_code} ORDER BY r.CREATED_AT ASC
